meanings.definition: Rough or harsh in manner or speech.
meanings.sent1: The gruff man shouted at the kids to get off his lawn.
meanings.sent2: His gruff tone scared away the timid puppy.
meanings.sent3: The gruff teacher's stern look made the students giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her gruff exterior hid a kind heart underneath.
meanings.sent5: The gruff bouncer at the club intimidated the rowdy patrons.

meanings.sent1: The gruff of the engine echoed through the garage.
meanings.sent2: The bear's gruff growl warned the hikers to stay away.
meanings.sent3: The gruff of the old door creaked in protest.
meanings.sent4: The gruff of the thunder shook the windows.
meanings.sent5: The gruff of the waves crashing against the rocks was deafening.
